title: Why is ranked all of a sudden such a coin flip lately?
body:
Trying my best to keep my fucking mental and not be a toxic as hell player, but my goodness, the state of ranked for me lately has been so atrocious, i cannot fathom how anyone has ever reached my rank thus far. Before any single person comes in and tells me that it its my fault that I lost those games, that may indeed be the case, I of course have things to improve on just like everyone else. Game after game of afk farming junglers, game after game of players ignoring others and throwing leads, game after game of players taking farm from carries because every single person has the mental of a pea. 


I recently demoted to platinum 3 on the oce server, and for the first time this season i am finding players are not where they  should be. The odd occasional game i would get some players who would make some mistakes and that was okay, and then i would get an equal balance of good players on my team, ones who synergise well and help out team mates. 

What is going on, are other players finding this to be the case? I dont understand, why would i want to play ranked with players who DONT WANT TO WIN?

I don't think you can make such a bold statement such as that to say that my abilities are the same to that of the people in my rank, and that i've basically reached my capacity? Such a pretentious thing to say to someone you don't know at all lol? 
League of legends is a team game, and you're only as strong as your weakest player. I think there are too many factors that affect just winning a game, and I have noticed, especially as of late (at the time of posting this post) that teams are extremely coin flip; people tilt easier, junglers tend to tunnel for themselves rather than the team, and nobody really cares if they win or lose. Fair enough. This post was literally to just complain for the sake of complaining, and see if other people were experiencing teams playing worse than before. Because that's just it. My teams were great literally a week before, heck the entire season before. And I don't just mean i won more games or anything, even the losses were great. Teammates were making bad decisions, but it was okay. They still did their best. They still played to win and still helped the team out. Nobody afkd or rq. Nobody took farm from others in a rage for doing something silly. It was a grindy ranked, but it was a good ranked. Now it's just annoying man haha.
Also, my goodness you sound so toxic, what the heck is your problem?

lmao yikes, why are you so triggered? I personally didnt think you're advice was good advice, and only would listen to you if you were indeed higher than me. But which rank are you? You say you're diamond 2 and Iron 4, make up your mind?

His rank has no relevant to the topic. Whether he is in bronze 5 or challenger is not a predominant reference you should pursue.

Your topic is about rank in general.

>  Game after game of afk farming junglers, game after game of players ignoring others and throwing leads, game after game of players taking farm from carries because every single person has the mental of a pea. 

This is a strawman arguement, it offer nothing but baseless view from your perspective. These players are around the same tier you are. You guys are neck and neck in term of ability. 

In other words, you've reached your capacity. But it is easier to blame others than to admit this is as far as you can go.
